name: Captain Says: FIRE!
description:
You are the helmsman of an pirate crew and your ship has been attacked by the straight-edge army. Unluckily your entire crew is drunk, especially the officer that is giving you drunk orders.

Instructions:

Arrow Keys/WASD to move

Space to shoot

Credits:
